skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse
skillTree.description: A master's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Eminent Grandmaster
skillTree.description: Capable of inspiring his Order to great deeds and accomplishments.

skillTree.name: Sigmar’s Ward
skillTree.description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Sigil of the Black Guard" and Knights of Morr Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: The Stoic
skillTree.description: Never seen to be laughing or joking, the Knights of Morr approach every situation with the utmost severity.

skillTree.name: The Silent
skillTree.description: When on duty, the Knights of Morr remain silent, except to deliver orders and battle calls.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Knights of Morr units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs infantry: +5 for Knights of Morr units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Knights of Morr units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs infantry: +10 for Knights of Morr units
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Honour the Panther" and Knights Panther Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: Beastslayer
skillTree.description: It is the goal of every Knight Panther to slay the monstrosities of chaos.

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +20%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Panther’s Purge
skillTree.description: Destruction of Chaos and Mutants, that is the mandate of the Knights Panther.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Knights Panther units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs large: +5 for Knights Panther units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Knights Panther units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs large: +10 for Knights Panther units
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "For the Emperor" and Reiksguard Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: Grand Heraldry of the Reiksguard
skillTree.description: What deeds accomplished and enemies slain have earned this man the honored red and white?

skillTree.name: Preceptor
skillTree.description: To be placed in charge of a Banner is a great honor. It is a privilege to serve under this man.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Sol Invictus" and Knights of the Blazing Sun Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: Myrmidia’s Gift
skillTree.description: For the chosen of Myrmidia, the Blazing Sun protects.

skillTree.name: Strategic Mastery
skillTree.description: Employing advanced battlefield tactics and engaging in civilized warfare has earned this Grandmaster his patron god’s favor.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +25% for Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +50% for Knights of the Blazing Sun units
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "For the White Wolf" and Knights of the White Wolf Barded Warhorse

skillTree.name: Biting Cold
skillTree.description: Whether a trick of the mind or a blessing from Ulric, the wind blows with an arctic chill when the wolves ride to battle.

skillTree.name: Most Ancient Order
skillTree.description: Though wild and barbaric in appearance, they are the first Templar Order, and maintain strict discipline in battle.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 7% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 15% for Knights of the White Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unwavering Discipline
skillTree.description: A master of many wars, his men follow him to battle without question.

skillTree.name: Honored and Renowned
skillTree.description: Any Knight from any order would be honored to serve with this Grandmaster.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light and Stubborn Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +3 for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light and Stubborn Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -20% for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light and Stubborn Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Empire Knights, Knights of the Evelasting Light and Stubborn Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Emperor's Finest
skillTree.description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

effects.description:

skillTree.name: Speed of Horse
skillTree.description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

skillTree.name: Pistolkorps
skillTree.description: This Lord expects his men to practice the disciplines of the Pistolkorps, and all be expert marksmen.

skillTree.name: Honest Steel
skillTree.description: Honest Empire-forged steel is all a state trooper could ask when confronting the myriad foes in battle.

skillTree.name: Mighty Forge
skillTree.description: Patrons of great forges and smiths expect, and are rewarded with, tougher and more enduring war machines.

skillTree.name: Imperial Gunnery
skillTree.description: Despite what the Dwarfs think, no other race can bring to bear such devastating artillery volleys.

skillTree.name: Strength of Hardship
skillTree.description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

skillTree.name: Sharpshooter
skillTree.description: The veteran marksman knows the precise range required to land the killing shot.

skillTree.name: Taste for Battle
skillTree.description: Some men grow to relish war, dulled to the pain and living solely for the thrill of the kill.

Melee attack: +5 for Wolf-Kin, Greatswords, Halberdiers, Reiksguard, Knights of the Blazing Sun, and Demigryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Artillery Master
skillTree.description: Those in command of ordnance can potentially decide a battle before the melee has even begun.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Headhunter
skillTree.description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Regal
backgroundSkills.description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Noble
backgroundSkills.description: "The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperious
backgroundSkills.description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Tracker
backgroundSkills.description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Monster Hunter
backgroundSkills.description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Kill the Heretics!
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos is nothing against our iron will!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Burn the Undead!
backgroundSkills.description: Those corpses will burn and only ash will remain.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Defender of Men
backgroundSkills.description: Walls can't dodge!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% when under siege
	(all units in army)

Reload time reduction: +10% when under siege
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Basic Training
backgroundSkills.description: The training of even basic troops is important because all hands are needed in these dangerous times.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Wolf-Kin, Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +1 for Wolf-Kin, Spearmen, Swordsmen, Free Company Militia, Halberdiers and Greatswords units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Imperial Calibration
backgroundSkills.description: They will not know what hit them!

effects.description:
Range: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +10% for artillery units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knight Heritage
backgroundSkills.description: Knights of the Empire have strong bloodlines.

	(all units in army)
